name: YahooNews
text:
The president appeared to celebrate after a dangerous ambush of Biden’s bus caravan on a busy Texas highway the previous day.

“I LOVE TEXAS!” he posted over a video of a truck nearly sideswiping the bus. He later said at a rally that it was a “hot thing.” https://t.co/3nuDlkKeLc https://t.co/KvkTRNxuEu

name: YahooNews
text: An obscure South Carolina company may be in line for millions of dollars in U.S. government funding to produce a coronavirus treatment after a former Republican senator with a financial stake in the business lobbied senior U.S. government officials https://t.co/JCWPQKJlXX
